title: Aptos Name Service Domains
description: Discover Aptos Name Service (ANS), the decentralized domain name system for the Aptos blockchain that allows users to register human-readable .apt domains linked to their wallet addresses and on-chain identities.

tasks.title: Prepare for Domain Registration
tasks.description: Add at least 0.05 APT to your wallet to explore the Aptos Name Service

tasks.title: ANS Basics
tasks.description: Understand what Aptos Name Service is and how it works
tasks.question: What is the main purpose of Aptos Name Service (ANS)?
options: To provide website hosting services
To convert Aptos addresses to human-readable domain names
To serve as an exchange for buying and selling APT
To secure the Aptos network through staking
tasks.correctAnswer: To convert Aptos addresses to human-readable domain names

tasks.title: Domain Extensions
tasks.question: What is the standard domain extension for Aptos Name Service?
options: .aptos
.apt
.move
.crypto

tasks.title: Domain Registration
tasks.description: Understanding how to register an ANS domain
tasks.question: How are ANS domains typically registered?
options: For free with any Aptos wallet
Through a paid registration process with annual renewal fees
Through a one-time payment for permanent ownership
Only through invitations from existing domain owners
tasks.correctAnswer: Through a paid registration process with annual renewal fees

tasks.title: Domain Utility
tasks.description: Learn how ANS domains can be used
tasks.question: How can you use your ANS domain in the Aptos ecosystem?
options: Only as a profile display name
As a send/receive address, profile name, and website pointer
Only for receiving tokens, not sending
Only for accessing special Aptos dApps
tasks.correctAnswer: As a send/receive address, profile name, and website pointer

tasks.title: Implementation Technology
tasks.question: What blockchain technology is ANS built with?
options: Solidity smart contracts
Move modules on Aptos
Traditional DNS servers with blockchain verification
Layer 2 solution on Ethereum

tasks.title: Domain Management
tasks.description: Learn about managing your ANS domains
tasks.question: What can domain owners do with their ANS domains?
options: Only transfer to other wallets
Set text records, wallet addresses for different chains, and transfer ownership
Only use them as non-transferable identifiers
Only set a profile picture
tasks.correctAnswer: Set text records, wallet addresses for different chains, and transfer ownership

tasks.title: Domain Trading
tasks.description: Understanding the secondary market for ANS domains
tasks.question: How can ANS domains be traded after registration?
options: They can't be traded or transferred
Only through the official ANS marketplace
Through direct peer-to-peer transfers or NFT marketplaces that support them
Only to addresses that don't already have a domain
tasks.correctAnswer: Through direct peer-to-peer transfers or NFT marketplaces that support them

tasks.title: ANS as NFTs
tasks.description: Understanding the token nature of ANS domains
tasks.question: How are ANS domains represented on the blockchain?
options: As fungible tokens similar to APT
As non-fungible tokens (NFTs) with unique properties
As smart contract access rights only
As database entries not connected to tokens
tasks.correctAnswer: As non-fungible tokens (NFTs) with unique properties
